1 1/2 pounds beef chuck roast, cut into 1-inch pieces,1 1/2 teaspoons kosher salt,1 teaspoon ground black pepper,1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste,1/2 teaspoon paprika,2 tablespoons avocado oil or vegetable oil,1 cup yellow onion,1/2 cup celery,1/2 cup green pepper,4 cloves garlic, minced,2 tablespoons soy sauce,1 1/2 teaspoons orcestershire sauce,1 1/2 teaspoons granulated garlic,8 cups water,2 tablespoons beef bouillon paste,12 ounces dry spaghetti,4 large hard boiled eggs, peeled and halved,1 cup green onions,,
